00023 #include <Parametre_implicite.h>
00024 #include <Param.h>
00025 
00026 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Parametre_implicite,"Parametre_implicite",Parametre_equation_base);
00027 
00028 // Par defaut les seuils sont negatifs (donc pas utilisables!!)
00029 Parametre_implicite::Parametre_implicite()
00030 {
00031   seuil_convergence_implicite()=-1.;
00032 // seuil_convergence_solveur()=-1.;
00033   seuil_generation_solveur_=-1;
00034   seuil_verification_solveur_=-1;
00035   seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur_=-1;
00036   seuil_test_preliminaire_lu_=0;
00037   seuil_diffusion_implicite_=-1;
00038   nb_it_max_=1000000;
00039   calcul_explicite_=0;
00040   Nom eq_freq_resolue="0";
00041   equation_frequence_resolue_.setNbVar(1);
00042   equation_frequence_resolue_.setString(eq_freq_resolue);
00043   equation_frequence_resolue_.addVar("t");
00044   equation_frequence_resolue_.parseString();
00045 }
00046 
00047 Sortie& Parametre_implicite::printOn(Sortie& os) const
00048 {
00049   return os;
00050 }
00051 
00052 // XD parametre_implicite parametre_equation_base parametre_implicite -1 Keyword to change for this equation only the parameter of the implicit scheme used to solve the problem.
00053 // XD attr seuil_convergence_implicite floattant seuil_convergence_implicite 1 Keyword to change for this equation only the value of seuil_convergence_implicite used in the implicit scheme.
00054 // XD attr seuil_convergence_solveur floattant seuil_convergence_solveur 1 Keyword to change for this equation only the value of seuil_convergence_solveur used in the implicit scheme
00055 // XD attr solveur solveur_sys_base solveur 1 Keyword to change for this equation only the solver used in the implicit scheme
00056 // XD attr resolution_explicite rien resolution_explicite 1 To solve explicitly the equation whereas the scheme is an implicit scheme.
00057 // XD attr equation_non_resolue rien equation_non_resolue 1 Keyword to specify that the equation is not solved.
00058 // XD attr equation_frequence_resolue chaine equation_frequence_resolue 1 Keyword to specify that the equation is solved only every n time steps (n is an integer or given by a time-dependent function f(t)).
00059 Entree& Parametre_implicite::readOn(Entree& is)
00060 {
00061   Nom eq_freq_resolue="0";
00062   double seuil_convergence_solveur_prov=-1;
00063   Param param(que_suis_je());
00064   param.ajouter("solveur",&le_solveur_);
00065   param.ajouter( "seuil_convergence_implicite",&seuil_convergence_implicite_);
00066   param.ajouter( "seuil_convergence_solveur",&seuil_convergence_solveur_prov);
00067 
00068   param.ajouter("seuil_generation_solveur",&seuil_generation_solveur_);
00069   param.ajouter("seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur",&seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur_);
00070   param.ajouter("seuil_verification_solveur",&seuil_verification_solveur_);
00071 
00072   param.ajouter( "resolution_explicite_diffusion_implicite",&seuil_diffusion_implicite_);
00073   param.ajouter_flag( "resolution_explicite",&calcul_explicite_);
00074   param.ajouter( "equation_frequence_resolue",&eq_freq_resolue);
00075   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00076   if (param.get_list_mots_lus().rang("seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur")>0)
00077     seuil_test_preliminaire_lu_=1;
00078   if (seuil_convergence_solveur_prov>0)
00079     set_seuil_solveur_avec_seuil_convergence_solveur(seuil_convergence_solveur_prov);
00080   if (seuil_diffusion_implicite_>0)
00081     calcul_explicite_=1;
00082   equation_frequence_resolue_.setString(eq_freq_resolue);
00083   equation_frequence_resolue_.parseString();
00084   le_solveur_.nommer("solveur_implicite");
00085   return is;
00086 }
00087 
00088 //
00089 //! permet de mettre les seuils equivalents a ceux de la 161<br>pour l'instant warning ensuite ereur.
00090 void  Parametre_implicite::set_seuil_solveur_avec_seuil_convergence_solveur(double seuil_convergence_solveur)
00091 {
00092   if (seuil_convergence_solveur<0)
00093     return;
00094   Cerr<< "Warning: using of seuil_convergence_solveur is obsolete, use seuil_generation_solveur,seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur,seuil_verification_solveur "<<finl;
00095   /*
00096     #ifndef NDEBUG
00097     Cerr << "This warning is an error when using a debug TRUST version." << finl;
00098     Process::exit();
00099     #endif
00100   */
00101   if (seuil_generation_solveur_<0)
00102     seuil_generation_solveur_=seuil_convergence_solveur;
00103   else
00104     {
00105       Cerr<< "You can not use seuil_generation_solveur and seuil_convergence_solveur in the same block" <<finl;
00106       exit();
00107     }
00108   if (seuil_verification_solveur_<0)
00109     seuil_verification_solveur_=seuil_convergence_solveur;
00110   else
00111     {
00112       Cerr<< "You can not use seuil_verification_solveur and seuil_convergence_solveur in the same block" <<finl;
00113       exit();
00114     }
00115   if (seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur_<0)
00116     seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur_=seuil_convergence_solveur;
00117   else
00118     {
00119       Cerr<< "You can not use seuil_test_preliminaire_solveur and seuil_convergence_solveur in the same block" <<finl;
00120       exit();
00121     }
00122 }
